page.title: 07HOME LIFE- TEN YEAR OLD GIRL
page.content: 1.At seven o,clock I get up and get dressed. 2.Then I go down stairs and eat a breakfast of toast. 3.Next I get ready for school. 4.At eight thirty Debbie Harkness calls for me. 5.At eight thirty five we set off for school. It takes us five minutes to get there. 6.When we are at school we play on the bars. 7.In a few minutes the bus arrives and I go to meet Helen Dzendrowska, Alison Sollis and Michelle Dean. 8.Soon the bell goes. 9.We put our bags in the cloakroom and go into class. 10.Later we go out to dinner. Some of us have sandwiches. 11 Soon we go home. 12. I watch T.V. and have tea
